**************************************
Read Me WordpressRestApi NuGet Package
**************************************

Version 0.3.4.0
---------------

New feature:  AsyncEnumerable.ToArrayAsync can now take an integer to limit the number of
returned elements

Version 0.3.3.0
---------------

New feature:  fetch posts by tag

Version 0.3.2.0
---------------

New feature:  delete tag

Version 0.3.0.0
---------------

Breaking change from earlier versions:  drop the IQueryable support to accelerate development.
